title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the assigned alias names.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking on a column name, the alias name should be used instead of the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double-click on a column name to insert it in the formula.
4. Observe that the alias name should be used in the formula instead of the original name.
